mdRecord.dcterms:title: Apothecary scale set
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The 2 plate apothecary scale is contained in a cardboard and cloth box with an eagle design embossed on the lid. Handwritten notes can be found on an inner compartment that likely was used to hold weights at one time. No weights are currently included with the set.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Weighing instruments
